mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG_ALARM (ALARM_NO, USER_NO, ALARM_TYPE, ALARM_STATUS) VALUES(MSG_ALARM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{userNo}, #{msgNo}, #{alarmStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MSG_ALARM WHERE USER_NO = #{loginUserNo} AND ALARM_STATUS = 'N' AND ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE MSG_ALARM SET ALARM_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MSG_NO = #{msgNo}
mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NICK, TO_CHAR(mb.SEND_DATE, 'Mon', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH') AS SEND_MONTH, TO_CHAR(mb.SEND_DATE, 'DD"일"') AS SEND_DAY FROM MESSAGE_BOX mb JOIN MSG_ALARM ma ON mb.MSG_NO = ma.MSG_NO JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_NO = mb.SEND_USER_NO WHERE mb.RECEIVER_USER_NO = #{loginUser} AND ma.ALARM_STATUS = 'N' AND ma.ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE MSG_ALARM SET ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO = #{loginUserNo}
mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_NICK, p.ROOM_NAME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RESERVE_DAY, 'YY-MM-DD'), 'Mon', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH')AS RESERVE_MON, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RESERVE_DAY, 'YY-MM-DD'), 'DD"일"') AS RESERVE_DAY FROM ROOM_TIME t JOIN "USER" u ON u.USER_NO = t.RESERVE_USER_NO JOIN PRACTICE_ROOM p ON p.ROOM_NO = t.ROOM_NO WHERE OWNER_NO = ${loginUserNo} ORDER BY RESERVE_MON ASC, RESERVE_DAY DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ALARM WHERE USER_NO = ${loginUserNo} AND ROOM_ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'N' AND REPLY_ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET ROOM_ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'Y', BOARD_ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'Y', REPLY_ALARM_READ_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO = ${loginUserNo}
